title: 2 years and no Zac skin
body:
It's been 2 years since Zac was released and every other champion has had a new skin  except him....why couldn't he get debonair skin, he obviously wants a suit!

I mean I love playing zac but why can't riot think of a skin for zac ill take anything at this point!

replies.body:
eve went 4 years without a skin
4
YEARS
4
COUNT EM.

also, mercury zac. cause mercury is a liquid at room temperature.
Zac is really hard to make a skin for, he has the highest polygon count and animations out of all champions in the League. The skin they make wouldn't be worth it.
u know how they make the sound effects for zac?

They released a new Zac skin, are you stupid?

Definitely not an Udyr skin anyway...
